text: IS O. J. Simpson really asking Kim Kardashian for help to get forgiveness? This is the premise of an article from one of the tabloids this week. Gossip Cop it can destroy history. As widely reported, at the end of May Kardashian met with President Trump to ask for grace to Alice Johnson, who was serving a life sentence on nonviolent drug trafficking charges. At the beginning of June, Trump granted the grace and Johnson was released from prison after 21 years. Now according to the National Enquirer, ` ` Some wonder who might be next on Kim's list'' to help. ` ` Old family friend O. J. Simpson hopes it is him,'' says the supermarket tabloid. A so - called ` ` friend'' is quoted as saying
